speaker: Patient
content: Not great. I have had a headache for three days.

speaker: Doctor
content: On a scale of one to ten how would you rate the pain?

speaker: Patient
content: About a six. Sometimes it spikes to an eight.

speaker: Doctor
content: Is the pain constant or does it come and go?

speaker: Patient
content: It comes and goes. Worse in the morning.

speaker: Doctor
content: Have you taken anything for it?

speaker: Patient
content: Just ibuprofen. It helps a little.

speaker: Doctor
content: I am going to order some tests. Lets get this sorted out.
